page.title: 01LANDSCAPE:THORNTON CLEV.
page.content: I HAVE LIVED IN THORNTON CLEVELEYS FOR 5 YEARS.IT IS A SMALL TOWN WITH ABOUT 30 OOO PEOPLE. WE HAVE A SMALL SHOPPING PRECINCT NEAR AN OLD RAILWAY TRACK.THE SHOPPING PRECINCT USED TO BE AN OLD RAILWAY STATION.TO THE WEST OF THORNTON IS CLEVELEYS . IT IS A MAINLY RESIDENTIAL TOWN WITH LOTS OF BUNGALOWS FOR RETIRED PEOPLE.THE ONLY BIG FACTORY IS THE I.C.I PLASTICS FACTORY.IT ON A VERY LARGE SITE WITH LOTS OF BUILDINGS.I THINK THORNTON CLEVELEYS IS A VERY NICE PLACE FOR OLD AND YOUNG PEOPLE;IT IS SO CLEAN. I AM VERY LUCKY TO LIVE HERE THAN IN A STUFFY,BUSY TOWN. BY{CLARE EMERY}
